properties.areaDesc: Ventura County Mountains; Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 6:30PM PST until January 17 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Snow levels 4500 to 5500 feet on Thursday,
lowering to 3500 to 4500 feet by late Thursday evening. Total
snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 5500 feet, 2 to 4
inches between 4500 and 5500 feet, and a dusting to 2 inch
accumulations between 3500 and 4500 feet, including Interstate 5
near the Grapevine. South to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with
gusts to 50 mph.

* WHERE...Ventura and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the
Santa Monica Range.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 1 AM PST Friday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be difficult. Travel delays
and/or road closures are possible, including Interstate 5 near
the Grapevine and Highway 33.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling
1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 1 AM PST FRIDAY
